snippet.title: The Aquatic Adventure of the Last Human [Release Trailer - January 19th]
snippet.description:
The Aquatic Adventure of the Last Human is a pixelated, side-scrolling, underwater action-adventure game about exploring the decaying ruins of our species -- and fighting deadly sea-creatures -- in search of answers about our downfall.

OUT NOW ON:

Steam: 
http://store.steampowered.com//app/401360?beta=0

Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/aquaticadventureofthelasthuman_storefront

GoG: http://www.gog.com/game/aquatic_adventure_of_the_last_human_the

Follow us on Twitter or Facebook @ycjygames :)
